default: Are you leaving home? Do you want me to take care of everything meanwhile?
Are you all going out? Shall I take care of the house meanwhile?
Ok, I'm in charge now. Take care outside!
Sure, I'll run the house while you're out! See you later!
Hey, are you coming back home?
Welcome back! I hope you had a good time!
Welcome home! Hope you had fun!
Happy you are back! Hope you had a good time!
